articles.title: 'Pakistan Wouldn't Travel To India If..': Minister Sets ODI World Cup Participation Criteria - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Pakistan's Sports Minister has set clear ODI World Cup criteria for his team, giving new twist to the Asia Cup venue saga.
articles.content: For months, the debate over the venues Asia Cup and ODI World Cup has had the entire cricketing fraternity engulfed. After the hybrid format was agreed upon between the Pakistan Cricket Board and the… [+2378 chars]

articles.title: How much protein do you need to build muscle; read THIS to know - Asianet Newsable
